mel.gl: Instrumental anaphoric (with it); inanimate oblique anaphoric (at/about… it); Existential predicate
Locative anaphoric (there); inanimate oblique anaphoric (at/about… it); Existential predicate

a tree of which bows are made
deep rock cave; Entrance of Hell
narrow entrance; esp. entrance into Hades (Panoi)
soul; spirit of a deceased person

seal, put together (two planks+); assemble, mount

rear with food (e.g. a pig); pig
rear with food, tame by feeding
woven food-chest standing above fire for storing almonds and dried breadfruit
Possessive Classifier for farming valuables (pig, garden+)
make a fire, by arranging wood and stones
[n] bunch of <fruit+>; [vi] be hanging in cluster
cluster, bundle, bunch of <fruit+>, esp. bunch of fruit hanging together on tree
prefix before numerals, referring to a group of people

(v.) bake food in stone oven; (n.) ovenful of food
destroy s.o.'s properties as a punishment
(n.) wooden club; (v.) blow with a club
a creeper providing solid rattan-like fibre
call out; call (s.o./s.th.) so and so
pin <s.th.>; esp. pin together <thatch leaves> onto a rod
to fasten with pins, fold over and pin
plexus at the based of the fronds of sago & other palms
leaf of a kind of vine that is used for traditional medecine
ablative Prep./Conjunction: from; away; because; lest; than
go up, climb up; crawl; enter, exit; upwards
become dry, with heat or time
[adv.] (so as to) surround, cover, obstruct, prevent, protect…
prod, cut with point of knife
carry over the shoulder on a stick
(fire) smoulder; burn in a low manner to facilitate cooking

be lost, be absent, be out of sight; not be there, be somewhere else
be the odd one out, be isolated from a group
bend (esp. wood+), fold (s.th. more or less flexible)
be out of sight, be hidden
k.o. dance performed by young initiated men
break in two pieces; (with prefix °ma-) broken
be dry; run out of water; (tide) be low
wipe (hands+), tradit. using coconut husk fibres
Bixa orellana, plant used for its red dye
Classifier for temporary or inessential possession
dummy noun: the one who/which; relativiser
title of rank in women's suqe
(fire) burn down, burn in a low manner to facilitate cooking
fibre in the coconut husk (and/or) strainer made of coconut frond sheath
sheath around base of coconut frond, used as strainer
name of a shrub on the beach
[vt] pull; fish, go angling; draw, write
[v.] lift up; [adv.] up, upwards; immediately; (take) away/off…
climb (hill, tree); esp. climb <tree> to get some fruit

carry on shoulder a stick with burdens on both ends
(v.) sink, go down to deep place; fall into hole

sink down; be low, be deep; down
to tie, bind things or parts of things together
[vi] dash, rush out; fly away; jump
put in a crotch, hitch, to set a snare, esp. for birds (a children's game)
secret; secret meeting place in the bush for men during initiation rituals

(vt) stab, spear; play music with stamping bamboo
spill, pour out, esp. in a mass (liquid); throw away (rubbish+)

rub strongly; (esp.) light (fire) by rubbing wood
put s.th. back up after it fell
set up on end, hoist, erect

a square basket used for rubbish

a morsel of food thrown for a ghost

magic power; divine inspiration in o.'s actions (?), luck

stone, carried or hung up in a bag, possessed of magic powers as the abode of a 'vui'

carry over the shoulder on a stick

stiff, hard, tight, not slack; quickly
statue, sculpture; effigy, likeness, picture; photo
be first; before; in olden days
another; one… the other one; a, Indefinite Article

upper sky, where the stars are; (hence) honourific rank
